_header: I meekly unto you sovereign am sent
_description: A ‘sotelty’ for a bridal feast — one couplet

BodLatMisC66.Transcription:
I mekely vnto you souerayne am senteto dwell with you and euer be
                    present
BodLatMisC66.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             The Babees Book, etc.
EETS
         o.s. 32 (1868); rev. ed.  Early English Meals and
                Manners London: Trübner, 1876; repr. 1973: rev. ed. 358.
